text: Znayte, chto zhizn' v zdeshnem mire yest' obmanchivaya utekha, obol'shcheniye, suyetnyy naryad, tshcheslaviye mezhdu vami, zhelaniye otlichit'sya mnozhestvom imushchestva i detey: ona podobna tem proizrasteniyam pri dozhde, kotoryye soboy plenyayut zemledel'tsa, potom uvyadayut, posle togo vidish' ikh pozheltevshimi, naposledok delayutsya sukhimi steblyami. V budushchey zhizni ili zhestokaya muka, ili proshcheniye ot Boga i blagovoleniye. Zhizn' v zdeshnem mire yest' tol'ko obmanchivoye naslazhdeniye
